content: minimize interference with the PDUs that are mounted on the sides of the rack. The rack with the spine mounted and new optional fiber cable organizer hoops are shown in Figure 2-4. If necessary, the spine, and organizer hoops can be easily relocated for service procedures. Figure 2-4 IBM z16 A02 Vertical Cable Retention Bar and Cable Retention Clips 2.1.3 IBM z16 A02 system features The key features that are used to build the IBM z16 A02 configuration are listed in Table 2-2. Table 2-2 Key features that influence the system configurations Raised Floor No Yes but with Top Hat H/W 7802 Non-Raised Floor No (not supported) Yes but no Top Hat H/W 7998 and 7803 Non-Raised Floor No (not supported) Yes but with Top Hat H/W 7998 and 7802 Environment Bottom Exit Top Exit Features to order Rear view Cable Management Guide assembled Cable Retention Clips Vertical Cable Retention bar Upper attachment bracket Lower attachment bracket Rear view Tool-less cable retention clip attachment Feature Code
